channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- Shortcuts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- Shortcuts

item.title: CVE-2019-7290|2024-08-04T20:46:46.246Z -- apple -- shortcuts
item.description: An access issue was addressed with additional sandbox restrictions. This issue is fixed in Shortcuts 2.1.3 for iOS. A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions.

item.title: CVE-2019-7289|2024-08-04T20:46:46.112Z -- apple -- shortcuts
item.description: A parsing issue in the handling of directory paths was addressed with improved path validation. This issue is fixed in Shortcuts 2.1.3 for iOS. A local user may be able to view senstive user information.
